mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.line_no AS "lineNo", a.responsible_person_id AS "responsiblePersonId", a.commission_peison_id AS "commissionPeisonId", a.organize AS "organize", a.material_no AS "materialNo", a.package_mertiral_no AS "packageMertiralNo", a.num AS "num", a.deliver_num AS "deliverNum", a.standard_price AS "standardPrice", a.unit_price AS "unitPrice", a.total_amount AS "totalAmount", a.end_customer_id AS "endCustomerId", a.customer_segmentation AS "customerSegmentation", a.warranty_period AS "warrantyPeriod", a.extended_warr_period AS "extendedWarrPeriod", a.if_effective AS "ifEffective", a.if_return AS "ifReturn", a.invoice_num AS "invoiceNum"
mapper.select:
SELECT sur.name AS "responsiblePersonName", suc.name AS "commissionPeisonName", sof.name AS "organizeName", CONCAT(smi.material_name, " ", smi.model) AS "materialName", CONCAT(psmi.material_name, " ", psmi.model) AS "packageMertiralName", smi.model AS "model", smi.material_type AS "materialType", temp.customer_ch_name AS "customerChName", temp.industry AS "industry", temp.customer_diff AS "customerDiff", temp.region AS "region", temp.province_name AS "provinceName", temp.city_name AS "cityName",
FROM so_order_dtl a LEFT JOIN sys_user sur ON sur.id=a.responsible_person_id LEFT JOIN sys_user suc ON suc.id=a.commission_peison_id LEFT JOIN sys_office sof ON sof.id=a.organize LEFT JOIN sm_mat_info smi ON smi.material_no=a.material_no LEFT JOIN sm_mat_info psmi ON psmi.material_no=a.package_mertiral_no LEFT JOIN (SELECT cci.id AS id, cci.customer_id AS customer_id, cci.customer_ch_name AS customer_ch_name, cci.customer_type AS customer_type, cci.industry AS industry, cci.customer_diff AS customer_diff, cci.region AS region, sap.name AS province_name, sac.name AS city_name FROM CM_CUSTOMER_INFO cci LEFT JOIN sys_area sap ON sap.code=cci.province LEFT JOIN sys_area sac ON sac.code=cci.city) temp ON a.end_customer_id=temp.customer_id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY a.line_no

SELECT sur.name AS "responsiblePersonName", suc.name AS "commissionPeisonName", sof.name AS "organizeName", CONCAT(smi.material_name, " ", smi.model) AS "materialName", smi.model AS "model", smi.material_type AS "materialType", temp.customer_ch_name AS "customerChName", temp.industry AS "industry", temp.customer_diff AS "customerDiff", temp.region AS "region", temp.province_name AS "provinceName", temp.city_name AS "cityName", iid.INVOICE_DATE AS "invoiceDate",
FROM so_order_dtl a LEFT JOIN sys_user sur ON sur.id=a.responsible_person_id LEFT JOIN sys_user suc ON suc.id=a.commission_peison_id LEFT JOIN sys_office sof ON sof.id=a.organize LEFT JOIN sm_mat_info smi ON smi.material_no=a.material_no LEFT JOIN (SELECT cci.id AS id, cci.customer_id AS customer_id, cci.customer_ch_name AS customer_ch_name, cci.customer_type AS customer_type, cci.industry AS industry, cci.customer_diff AS customer_diff, cci.region AS region, sap.name AS province_name, sac.name AS city_name FROM CM_CUSTOMER_INFO cci LEFT JOIN sys_area sap ON sap.code=cci.province LEFT JOIN sys_area sac ON sac.code=cci.city) temp ON a.end_customer_id=temp.customer_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT LINE_NO, MAX(INVOICE_DATE) AS INVOICE_DATE FROM im_invoice_dtl WHERE order_no = #{orderNo} GROUP BY LINE_NO) iid ON iid.LINE_NO = a.LINE_NO WHERE a.order_id = #{id} ORDER BY a.line_no

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO so_order_dtl( id, proc_ins_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, order_id, line_no, responsible_person_id, commission_peison_id, organize, material_no, package_mertiral_no, num, deliver_num, standard_price, unit_price, total_amount, end_customer_id, customer_segmentation, warranty_period, extended_warr_period, if_effective, if_return, invoice_num ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{procInsId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{orderId}, #{lineNo}, #{responsiblePersonId}, #{commissionPeisonId}, #{organize}, #{materialNo}, #{packageMertiralNo}, #{num}, #{deliverNum}, #{standardPrice}, #{unitPrice}, #{totalAmount}, #{endCustomerId}, #{customerSegmentation}, #{warrantyPeriod}, #{extendedWarrPeriod}, #{ifEffective}, #{ifReturn}, #{invoiceNum} )
mapper.update: UPDATE so_order_dtl SET proc_ins_id = #{procInsId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, order_id = #{orderId}, line_no = #{lineNo}, responsible_person_id = #{responsiblePersonId}, commission_peison_id = #{commissionPeisonId}, organize = #{organize}, material_no = #{materialNo}, package_mertiral_no = #{packageMertiralNo}, num = #{num}, deliver_num = #{deliverNum}, standard_price = #{standardPrice}, unit_price = #{unitPrice}, total_amount = #{totalAmount}, end_customer_id = #{endCustomerId}, customer_segmentation = #{customerSegmentation}, warranty_period = #{warrantyPeriod}, extended_warr_period = #{extendedWarrPeriod}, if_effective = #{ifEffective}, if_return = #{ifReturn}, invoice_num = #{invoiceNum} WHERE id = #{id}
